name: Haunted hallway (itch) (ExplodingPixel)
description:
You just moved to your new house, but it's pretty clear somethings wrong from the start. Find all the necessary items to escape from the creature. Or if you are brave enough, go for the secret ending and put an end to the creature.

--Update released:

After some feedback, I fixed some bugs (Menus not working, getting stuck in the ceiling, ...) . i also added a way to "Hide", as long as your flashlight is turned off the monster won't chase you anymore but can still kill you if you are directly in his line of sight. If you guys have some more feedback please let me know.

- end update 1

This is the first game I ever made. I really hope you enjoy it. Please let me now in the comments what I can improve on and what I should keep in mind making my next game.
